actions.name: R: Bone dust +7 vs. PD
actions.desc: 7 negative damage, and the target chooses between being dazed (save ends) OR taking a 1 penalty to all defenses until the end of the battle (cumulative to 4).

traits.name: Tormentors mark
traits.desc: Once per battle when the tormentor imp hits with a natural even attack roll it does an extra 2d6 ongoing acid damage (easy save 6+ ends).

traits.name: Freakish leap
traits.desc: On rounds when the escalation die is odd the imp may fly as a quick action once on its turn, landing at the end of its movement.

nastier_traits.name: Resist magic 13+
nastier_traits.desc: This creature has _resist damage 13+_ to all damage from magic sources (even magic weapons). When a magic attack targets this creature, the attacker must roll a natural 13+ on the attack roll or it only deals half damage.
